content.title: This website
content.description: This is my personal website. It is a simple website that I created to show my projects and to show my skills.

content.title: Cidade Alta Challenge
content.description: A project developed with Next.js and React.js. It's a web application that allows you to create and manage penal codes for the city of Cidade Alta.

content.title: Pedido Pago Challenge
content.description: A dashboard developed with Next.js to manage colaborators and their permissions. I also introduced tests with Jest and React Testing Library.

content.title: Byte
content.description: A simple blog with the focus on technology articles, inside the site is possible to see articles about differents topics.
